section.p: Administration or application of remedies to a patient or for a disease or an injury; medicinal or surgical management; therapy. Source: The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateTreatment with data type Point In Time
This is date and time that the treatment was started.

Contains exactly one [1..1] treatmentId with data type Id
Unique Identifier for the treatment

Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
Contains the treatment instituted as a result of this non-O.R. procedure occurrence.

This is date and time that the treatment was started.
